name: Voguepay plugin for Paid Memberships Pro
author: kunlexzy

sections.description:
Paid Memberships Pro is a complete member management and membership subscriptions plugin for WordPress.

VoguePay is a unique online payment processor whose vision is to offer buyers and sellers a secure and easy-to-use means of transacting business online.

VoguePay allows site owners to receive payment for their goods and services on their website without any setup fee.

VoguePay distinguishes itself from other online payment processors with its array of features that are guided by its core values:

  • Security
  • User Friendliness
  • Reliability

To signup on Voguepay, visit here

Note

Before you start accepting payment on your site, login to your Voguepay Account go to Account Settings then API Settings, then turn on Enable Notification API. Then click on Save Changes for the changes to be effected.
It is very important that you do this before you start accepting payment on your site.
sections.installation:
Requirements

  • Installed and activated Paid Memberships Pro Plugin
  • Voguepay Account

Automatic installation

  • Login to your WordPress Admin area
  • Go to “Plugins > Add New” from the left hand menu
  • In the search box type “Voguepay plugin for Paid Memberships Pro”
  • click on “Install” to install the plugin
  • click “Activate” to activate it
  • Navigate to Membership > Payment Settings to configure the plugin

Manual Installation

  1. Download the plugin zip file
  2. Create a folder “pmpro-voguepay” in wp-content/plugins and extract all contents from the zip into it or upload the zip via the plugin section on the admin page.
  3. Click installed plugins in plugin tab
  4. Click activate to enable this on Paid Memberships Pro
  5. Navigate to Membership > Payment Settings to configure the plugin

short_description: This plugin allows you to accept payment from local and international customers on  Paid Memberships Pro.
description:
Paid Memberships Pro is a complete member management and membership subscriptions plugin for WordPress.

VoguePay is a unique online payment processor whose vision is to offer buyers and sellers a secure and easy-to-use means of transacting business online.

VoguePay allows site owners to receive payment for their goods and services on their website without any setup fee.

VoguePay distinguishes itself from other online payment processors with its array of features that are guided by its core values:

  • Security
  • User Friendliness
  • Reliability

To signup on Voguepay, visit here

Note

Before you start accepting payment on your site, login to your Voguepay Account go to Account Settings then API Settings, then turn on Enable Notification API. Then click on Save Changes for the changes to be effected.
It is very important that you do this before you start accepting payment on your site.
